title: Rengar
body: Is rengar worth buying after his nerf?

replies.body:
even after his nerf this cham still have a {{summoner:1}}and  {{summoner:7}} with his W which is more better version of {{champion:122}} ' Q and {{champion:41}} 'E one of them deal damage and heal but don't remove CC the other don't do damage 
he still have a Cri first hit, still have a {{summoner:6}} like and wreak version {{champion:56}} ult.
he clean jg super fast, early pressure super hard, can get away easy after kill have a {{summoner:1}} {{summoner:6}} {{summoner:7}} which not include his summer spell and no one can 1 v 1 his in jg area from lv1 to lv 18 .
Yes. He is fun to play. I like to build (in no order) youmus, BORK, sunfire visage, then leave a situational item.
